entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
